home.title: MODERN SOUND, BUT REAL
home.subheader: I like music with impact, identity and soul

text-1.line-1: If you want to sound like everyone else, <bold>stop reading.</bold>
text-1.line-2: If you want it to seem like a robot made it, <bold>stop reading.</bold>
text-1.line-3: If you want to half-ass stuff, <bold>stop reading.</bold>

home.text-2: If you want to create something unique, I want to work with you.

service-1.title: Production
service-1.text-1: The goal is to make the music as good as possible. We need to touch up the songs and make sure they communicate the project’s vision. There’s nothing better for that than and outside & expert opinion. At this stage, egos are left at the door.

service-2.title: Recording
service-2.text-1: My job is to get the most out of the musician to achieve the best performance. Also, at this step we create the sound of the project. Mediocre doesn’t cut it, OK doesn’t cut it, only excellence does. We come here to put in the effort, and you’ll walk out a better musician.

service-3.title: Mixing
service-3.text-1: This is not just making shit sound cool or every instrument heard. We need to give the music the emotional impact it deserves, and every project its own identity. And, unlike other producers, I care about the band’s taste.

service-4.title: Mastering
service-4.text-1: Mastering is essential for the music to compete in the current market. Songs need to sound loud, albums need to flow, and vinyl has very specific requirements. The last step for the music to come alive.

about.title: About
about.text-1: Mi work is something I take VERY seriously and I am convinced <dark>there’s no one that gets as involved as I do in the projects they work on.</dark>
about.text-2: From pre-production to well after release, I’m interested in knowing the bands, their vision and goals, and help them make better music, improve as musicians, and achieve their goals.
about.text-3: I’ve said before I look for a MODERN BUT REAL SOUND. I like music with real instruments and the energy of a performance, and I couldn’t care less about music styles, type of instruments, how “serious” a project is or whatever methods we need to use to achieve that vision.
about.text-4: <dark>If you’re passionate about your music, I want to work with you.</dark>

estudio.title: Studio
estudio.text-1: My studio is located downtown in Barcelona, with a recording room over 50 square metres in size and with high ceilings that’s perfect to record music, acoustic instruments and even full bands.
estudio.text-2: My gear is a reflection of both my personal taste and the versatility I need to create the sounds my clients want.
estudio.text-3: During every project there’s time to try different stuff and for the taste and preference of each band to shine through, creating a unique sonic picture.
estudio.text-4: In the premises we have the studio, other spaces and even an art gallery and a bar. It’s perfect for every musician to feel comfortable, inspired, and have its own space to chill.
estudio.text-5: Only 5 minutes walking from both Arc de Triomf and Urquinaona Square, it’s the perfect creative environment to record music in one of the more modern cities in Europe.

work.title: Work
work.text-1: It is VERY IMPORTANT to me to give every project its own sound and identity. If everything sounded the same music would make me bored.
work.text-2: If you want to listen to more of my work or other music styles,

card-1.name: Dez
card-1.review: Recording with Dani is a pure pleasure. One of his best virtues is his great technical training with international producers, which lets you know different techniques and more optimized methods you don't find in other local studios. Another thing to point out is that you won't leave the studio without learning something. We (The Fox 196) are proud of his work and sharing the passion he has for music.

card-2.name: Kirian
card-2.review: Working with him has been an amazing experience [...] We’ve learned a lot, especially about the prepro and production processes, and we couldn’t be any happier with the final result. Having Dani help you in your project means giving it a pro touch and adding extra value that will surprise the listener.

card-3.name: Chander
card-3.review: I've worked with Dani a couple of times and still today it amazes me how much I learn throughout all of the recording process. You can't work with him and come out of the studio being the same musician. He knows how to get and exploit every detail of your productions, both technically and emotionally.

card-4.name: Perarnau
card-4.review: Dani is a demanding producer, very intelligent and professional at work. He always knows how to treat you and act so you feel comfortable and safe. I’ve been to different studios and haven’t felt as comfortable as in his. He always chooses what’s best for every song, having different options to find the sound you’re looking for, and knows what’s good for your music and what isn’t, giving you the best advice and letting you choose

card-5.name: Marc
card-5.review: Tracking with Dani has meant a huge musical learning for me. He has shown me how to open your mind in regards to songwriting, I have improved my guitar playing with his tips and, most importantly, is how open and coherent he is when talking about your music. He'll advise you in a way that will make the song better.

contact.title: Contact
contact.hero: Do you want to work with me? Let me know more about your project
contact.header: If you believe we could make a great team, contact me to talk about your record, visit the studio and start creating something unique.
